item.title: Python 源码编译时 uuid 模块报错
item.description: 系统环境 CentOS Linux release 7.6.1810 (Core) gcc version 4.8.5 20150623 (Red Hat 4.8.5-36) (GCC) Python-3.7.2 uuid-devel.x86_64 1.6.2-26.el7 场景 描述 在 Centos7 通过源码编译安装 Python 3.7.2 ，出现以下错误 building '_uuid' extension gcc -pthread -fPIC -Wno-unused-result -Wsign-compare -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O3 -Wall -std=c99 -Wextra -Wno-unused-result -Wno-unused-parameter -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Werror=implicit-function-declaration -I./Include -I/home/tt/py37/include -I. -I/usr/local/include -I/home/tt/Python-3.7.2/Include -I/home/tt/Python-3.7.2 -c /home/tt/Python-3.7.2/Modules/_uuidmodule.c -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.7/home/tt/Python-3.7.2/Modules/_uuidmodule.o In file included from /home/tt/Python-3.7.2/Modules/_uuidmodule.c:8:0: /usr/include/uuid.h:94:24: error: conflicting types for ‘uuid_t’ typedef struct uuid_st uuid_t; ^ In file included from /home/tt/Python-3.
